Summary: round yellow orb VERY fast and not load
divs: Sighting DetailsI was with my girlfriend driving for Walmart down what I'm thining was 6th street maybe and I looked up and my girlfriend made a remark kind like WOOOOAH WHAT IS THAT and I said I don't know but by the time I I could finshedbit flew back behind the treesnd I sped up but couldn't see it after that. I then witnessed this same phenomenon less that 10 miles from the same place on my from work one night astound the same time and was driving to my house and saw the same yellowish orb near a baseball field and by the time I saw it it shot to the left then straght and to the right at an angle and I was completly speechless and my phone range because a girl I worked with called me to ask me what it was cause she was freaking out
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around March 23rd 2013
